data.title: Scoggin v. Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska et al
authors: US District Court for the District of Nebraska
data.meta_description: Civil Rights: Other case filed on February 18, 2024  in the Nebraska District Court
data.text: April 11, 2024 Filing 17 GENERAL ORDER 2024-03 - Following Magistrate Judge Susan M. Bazis's appointment as a United States District Judge on April 10, 2024, this case is reassigned to Magistrate Judge Jacqueline M. DeLuca as set forth in this order. Ordered by Chief Judge Robert F. Rossiter, Jr.. (LKO) March 27, 2024 Filing 16 SUMMONS Returned Executed upon defendant Amy Williams on 3/5/2024. (Chaloupka, Maren) March 27, 2024 Filing 15 SUMMONS Returned Executed upon defendant Chuck Love, Jr. on 3/14/2024. (Chaloupka, Maren) March 27, 2024 Filing 14 SUMMONS Returned Executed upon defendant Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska on 3/5/2024. (Chaloupka, Maren) March 27, 2024 Filing 13 SUMMONS Returned Executed upon defendant Trev Alberts on 3/1/2024. (Chaloupka, Maren) March 27, 2024 Filing 12 TEXT ORDER granting #11 Motion for Extension of Time to File a Responsive Pleading. Defendant Chuck Love, Jr. shall answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint by April 19, 2024. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Susan M. Bazis. (LRH) March 27, 2024 Filing 11 UNOPPOSED MOTION for Extension of Time to File a Responsive Pleading by Attorney Denise E. Frost on behalf of Defendant Chuck Love, Jr..(Frost, Denise) March 25, 2024 Filing 10 NOTICE of Appearance by Attorney Denise E. Frost on behalf of Defendant Chuck Love, Jr. (Frost, Denise) March 22, 2024 Filing 9 TEXT ORDER granting #8 Motion for Extension of Time to File a Responsive Pleading. Defendants shall answer or otherwise respond to the Complaint by April 19, 2024. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Susan M. Bazis. (LRH) March 21, 2024 Filing 8 UNOPPOSED MOTION for Extension of Time to File a Responsive Pleading by Attorney Lily Amare on behalf of Defendants Trev Alberts, Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska, Amy Williams.(Amare, Lily) February 28, 2024 Filing 7 Summons Issued as to defendants Trev Alberts, Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska, Chuck Love, Jr., and Amy Williams. YOU MUST PRINT YOUR ISSUED SUMMONS, WHICH ARE ATTACHED TO THIS DOCUMENT. PAPER COPIES WILL NOT BE MAILED. (LKO) February 28, 2024 Filing 6 Summons Requested as to Amy Williams regarding Complaint #1 . (Chaloupka, Maren) February 28, 2024 Filing 5 Summons Requested as to Chuck Love, Jr. regarding Complaint #1 . (Chaloupka, Maren) February 28, 2024 Filing 4 Summons Requested as to Board of Regents of the University of Nebraska regarding Complaint #1 . (Chaloupka, Maren) February 28, 2024 Filing 3 Summons Requested as to Trev Alberts regarding Complaint #1 . (Chaloupka, Maren) February 20, 2024 Filing 2 TEXT NOTICE OF JUDGES ASSIGNED: Senior Judge John M. Gerrard and Magistrate Judge Susan M. Bazis assigned. In accordance with 28 U.S.C. 636(c)(2), the parties are notified that, if all parties consent, a magistrate judge may conduct a civil action or proceeding, including a jury or nonjury trial, subject to the courts rules and policies governing the assignment of judges in civil cases. See Fed. R. Civ. P. 73; NEGenR 1.4. (LKO)
